laserschein
Class Laser3D

java.lang.Object
  processing.core.PImage
      processing.core.PGraphics
          processing.core.PGraphics2D
              laserschein.Laser3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
public class Laser3D
extends processing.core.PGraphics2D

This graphics object (renderer) receives raw vertices from the Processing drawing routines. The vertices are already 2D.

Author:
allesblinkt

Method Detail

beginDraw

public void beginDraw()
Overrides:
beginDraw in class processing.core.PGraphics2D
See Also:
Also deletes the stored graphics in memory.

smooth

public void smooth()
Overrides:
smooth in class processing.core.PGraphics
See Also:
This function differs very much in Laserschein. Basically setting smooth skips most of the optimization (brake points etc.) and allows for sending raw points to the laser.

noSmooth

public void noSmooth()
Overrides:
noSmooth in class processing.core.PGraphics
See Also:
The opposite of smooth(). Tries to optimize all angles to be very exact.
